name: From The Depths (itch) (ItsHIM)
description:
DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR FULL EXPERIENCE, (INCLUDES AUDIO)

Play as a tendril of an ancient monstrosity sealed within the planet. You must consume the lives of others to reawaken your lost power, then once you are done you may burst out of this shell of rock and dirt.

The game is a short arcade style game, where your only objective is to gain as much score as possible before you are slain.

The game features upgrades, fast paced, short gameplay, with replayability and a "hidden" ending.
